changeSet.author: flight-booking-system
changeSet.comment: Insert 50 sample routes connecting major Indian cities

changeSet.author: flight-booking-system
changeSet.comment: Insert 100 sample flights (3 flights per route)

column.name: route_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT id FROM routes WHERE origin_airport_id = (SELECT id FROM airports WHERE code = 'DEL') AND destination_airport_id = (SELECT id FROM airports WHERE code = 'BOM') LIMIT 1)
